verses.verse: The earth <S%H776><s%> is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s, with its fullness; <S%H4393><s%> the world, <S%H8398><s%> and those who dwell therein. <S%H3427><s%>
For he has founded <S%H3245><s%> it on the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and established <S%H3559><s%> it on the floods. <S%H5104><s%>
Who may ascend <S%H5927><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s hill? <S%H2022><s%> Who may stand <S%H6965><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> place? <S%H4725><s%>

He who has clean <S%H5355><s%> hands <S%H3709><s%> and a pure <S%H1249><s%> heart; <S%H3824><s%> who has not lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> to falsehood, <S%H7723><s%> and has not sworn <S%H7650><s%> deceitfully. <S%H4820><s%>
He shall receive <S%H5375><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> from the God <S%H430><s%> of his salvation. <S%H3468><s%>
This is the generation <S%H1755><s%> of those who seek <S%H1875><s%> Him, <S%H1245><s%> who seek your face <S%H6440><s%>â€”even Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your heads, <S%H7218><s%> you gates! <S%H8179><s%> Be lifted up, <S%H5375><s%> you everlasting <S%H5769><s%> doors, <S%H8179><s%> and the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%> will come in. <S%H935><s%>
Who is the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory? <S%H3519><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> strong <S%H5808><s%> and mighty, <S%H1368><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your heads, <S%H7218><s%> you gates; <S%H8179><s%> yes, <S%H5375><s%> lift them up, you everlasting <S%H5769><s%> doors, <S%H6607><s%> and the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%> will come in. <S%H935><s%>
Who is this King <S%H4428><s%> of glory? <S%H3519><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory! <S%H3519><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
